About DellRoad Stuff

DellRoad Stuff is a dumping ground for various useful Java classes and ant build macros that have evolved over time from repeated use in several different projects.

Project Modules

This project has declared the following modules:

Name Description
DellRoad Stuff JiBX Classes DellRoad Stuff contains classes related to JiBX.
DellRoad Stuff Main DellRoad Stuff general purpose classes.
DellRoad Stuff Maven Plugin Maven plugin containing miscellaneous useful stuff.
DellRoad Stuff Persistent Object Classes DellRoad Stuff classes related to PersistenceObject, a very simple XML flat-file object database.
DellRoad Stuff Spring Classes DellRoad Stuff classes related to the Spring Framework.
DellRoad Stuff Test Classes DellRoad Stuff classes used for testing.
DellRoad Stuff Vaadin 7.x Classes DellRoad Stuff classes related to the Vaadin GUI framework.
DellRoad Stuff Vaadin 8.x Classes DellRoad Stuff classes related to the Vaadin GUI framework.
